original_text:
These are the generations
of the heavens and the earth when they were created,
in the day that the Lord God made the earth and the heavens.
korean_text: 이것이 천지가 창조될 때에 하늘과 땅의 내력이니 여호와 하나님이 땅과 하늘을 만드시던 날에

sentences.original_text: These are the generations of the heavens and the earth
in the day that the Lord God made the earth and the heavens.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님 여호와께서 땅과 하늘을 만드신 날에
